Mage Armor

Mage Armor is the class armor for the Mage.

Description

Mage Armor is a special armor obtained by using an Armor Kit on a tier-3 armor (Plate Mail, Scale Armor, or Leather Armor). It grants the wearer the ability to create magical energy that damages all visible enemies.

Special Ability

Magical Energy Burst: The Mage can create a magical energy burst that inflicts damage to all visible enemies and debuffs the hero with burning and paralysis for several turns.

Stats

  • Armor Class: Based on the base armor used to create it
  • Durability: Standard for class armor
  • Special: Can use Magical Energy Burst ability

Strategy

  • Use Magical Energy Burst when surrounded by multiple enemies
  • Best used when you can survive the debuffs while enemies don't
  • Can be effective when fighting groups of weak enemies
  • Consider the trade-off of damaging yourself with burning and paralysis

Technical Details

  • Implementation: MageArmor.java
  • Base Class: ClassArmor.java
